REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to prohibiting robosigned documents in foreclosure actions
Summary: Relates to prohibiting robosigned documents in foreclosure actions.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to foreclosure actions and robosigned documents
